text: “Nyagasani wacu! Mu by’ukuri natuje urubyaro rwanjye (Isimayili na nyina Hajara) mu kibaya kidahingwa, hafi y’ingoro yawe ntagatifu (Al Kaabat), Nyagasani wacu, kugira ngo bahozeho iswala. Bityo, shyira urukundo mu mitima y’abantu babakunde, kandi unabahe amafunguro kugira ngo babashe gushimira.”
